query:
SELECT 
  s.id, s.status, s.completedHotels, s.totalHotels,
  COUNT(sr.id) as result_count,
  AVG(sr.price) as avg_price,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sr.price > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as prices_found
FROM scans s
LEFT JOIN scanResults sr ON s.id = sr.scanId
WHERE s.id = 30002
GROUP BY s.id;
